name: Timesheet Export
description: CSV export of time records for payroll processing with PTO hooks for future enhancement.

prd.problemStatement: Payroll processing requires time records in a format compatible with payroll systems. Export capability bridges VibeOps with existing payroll workflows.
userStories: As a payroll admin, I want CSV exports so that I can process payroll
As a superintendent, I want scheduled exports so that payroll data is always ready
